section_title: Extension of exclusive legislative authority of Parliament of Canada.
section_text: 1 Section ninety-one of the   British North America Act, 1867, is amended by inserting therein, after item 2 “The regulation of trade and commerce”, the following item:— 2A Unemployment insurance.

2 This Act may be cited as the British North America Act 1940 and the British North America Acts 1867 to 1930, the  British North America Act 1907 and this Act, may be cited together as the British North America Acts 1867 to 1940.
